The only restlessness comes when the credits finally roll and you get to leave the theater .
With an emotional infertility to match its outer space setting , Soderbergh 's spectacular swing for the fence yields only a splendid whiff .
Denis O'Neill 's script avoids the prime sports cliche , a last-second goal to win the championship , but it forgets few others .
